Description:
Proficiency in troubleshooting hardware and software issues.
Knowledge of operating systems (Windows, macOS, Linux) and familiarity with their administration and configuration.
Understanding of networking concepts, protocols, and troubleshooting techniques.
Experience with computer hardware assembly, installation, and maintenance.
Knowledge of IT security principles and best practices.
Good communication skills, both verbal and written, to effectively interact with users and explain technical concepts.
Problem-solving and analytical thinking abilities to diagnose and resolve technical issues.
Customer service orientation and the ability to provide a positive user experience.
Time management and organizational skills to handle multiple tasks and prioritize accordingly.
Adaptability and willingness to learn new technologies and keep up with industry trends.Job Details
